remarks: Lemma for ~ rpmsubg and friends.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Jun-2015.)
statement:
cnmgpabl.m $e |- M = ( ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) |`s ( CC \ { 0 } ) ) $.
cnmsubglem.1 $e |- ( x e. A -> x e. CC ) $.
cnmsubglem.2 $e |- ( x e. A -> x =/= 0 ) $.
cnmsubglem.3 $e |- ( ( x e. A /\ y e. A ) -> ( x x. y ) e. A ) $.
cnmsubglem.4 $e |- 1 e. A $.
cnmsubglem.5 $e |- ( x e. A -> ( 1 / x ) e. A ) $.
cnmsubglem $p |- A e. ( SubGrp ` M ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d M x y $.
